statements: SELECT * FROM drone_inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM drone_inventory;
SELECT location, item_type FROM drone_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, last_maintenance_date FROM drone_inventory WHERE item_type='drone';
SELECT * FROM drone_inventory ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM drone_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC
SELECT item_name, item_type, quantity FROM drone_inventory WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT id, item_name, location FROM drone_inventory WHERE item_type IN ('Drone', 'Accessories') ORDER BY id
SELECT location, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM drone_inventory GROUP BY location HAVING total_quantity > 50
SELECT * FROM drone_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Drone' OR item_type = 'Accessories' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Drone_Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM Drone_Equipment WHERE quantity > 3;
SELECT equipment_id, last_maintenance_date FROM Drone_Equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT part_name FROM Spare_Parts WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT part_id, compatible_equipment FROM Spare_Parts ORDER BY part_id ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM Drone_Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Spare_Parts WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY part_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(part_id) AS total_parts FROM Spare_Parts WHERE compatible_equipment LIKE '%Drone%';
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Drone_Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, last_maintenance_date FROM Drone_Equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, part_name, quantity_needed FROM equipment_spare_parts WHERE quantity_needed >= 5;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity, location FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;

SELECT e.equipment_name, sp.part_name, esp.quantity_needed FROM equipment AS e JOIN equipment_spare_parts AS esp ON e.equipment_id = esp.equipment_id JOIN spare_parts AS sp ON sp.part_id = esp.part_id;

SELECT e.equipment_name, SUM(esp.quantity_needed) AS total_quantity FROM equipment AS e JOIN equipment_spare_parts AS esp ON e.equipment_id = esp.equipment_id GROUP BY e.equipment_name HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Drones;
SELECT drone_id, drone_model, purchase_date FROM Drones WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT part_id, part_name, part_type, quantity FROM SpareParts WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY entry_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, drone_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, duration, technician FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE duration > 5;
SELECT * FROM Drones ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, drone_model ASC, location;
SELECT Part_id, Part_name, Quantity FROM SpareParts WHERE Quantity >= 50 ORDER BY Part_name ASC;

SELECT Drones.drone_model, SpareParts.part_name, Inventory.quantity FROM Drones JOIN Inventory ON Drones.drone_id = Inventory.drone_id JOIN SpareParts ON SpareParts.part_id = Inventory.part_id WHERE Drones.purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Maintenance FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine' AND duration >= 60;

SELECT Drones.drone_id, Drones.drone_model, MaintenanceLogs.maintenance_date FROM Drones INNER JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON Drones.drone_id = MaintenanceLogs.drone_id WHERE MaintenanceLogs.technician = 'John Doe' ORDER BY MaintenanceLogs.maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Drones;
SELECT drone_name, drone_model FROM Drones WHERE drone_status='Active';
SELECT part_name, part_quantity FROM Spare_Parts ORDER BY part_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_Log WHERE maintenance_type='Routine Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT drone_name, repair_date FROM Repair_Schedule JOIN Drones ON Repair_Schedule.drone_id=Drones.drone_id;
SELECT * FROM Drones ORDER BY drone_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT drone_id, drone_name, drone_status FROM Drones WHERE drone_status = 'Active';
SELECT d.drone_name, p.part_name, di.quantity FROM Drones d INNER JOIN Drone_Inventory di ON d.drone_id = di.drone_id INNER JOIN Spare_Parts p ON di.part_id = p.part_id WHERE di.quantity > 5;
SELECT d.drone_name, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_type FROM Drones d INNER JOIN Maintenance_Log m ON d.drone_id = m.drone_id WHERE DATE(m.maintenance_date) > '2022-01-01';
SELECT d.drone_name, rs.repair_date, rs.repair_type FROM Drones d INNER JOIN Repair_Schedule rs ON d.drone_id = rs.drone_id WHERE rs.repair_type = 'Emergency';
